Probably won't last long before the crotch is worn through. Also, if you go commando, you will find the label on the waistband is very irritating on the skin. Trimmed it with scissors, but it is still annoying.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Fits good and they breathe well. Only problem I found so far is that the label in the back is not soft so it scratches my back. A little irritating.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Very comfortable. I wear these all the time, biking, jogging, around the house and for chores. All most like you are wearing nothing, after a few washes. I bought several pairs years ago. At a higher price. They do fade after a while which makes me love them even more.....
titles: Great value.  So comfy, true to size.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Many Positives for these workout shorts: soft material, washable without worries, nice deep pockets, strong drawstring (for keeping the pants from falling off if your waist gets smaller), knee-length if you have shortish legs.
One small negative: my waist size happens to be just between Large and Extra-Large, which made the XL much too big(even with that handy drawstring mentioned previously) and the L slightly too tight(which encourages me to lose some weight, which is a positive!).
I am keeping the size L(which this review is about) and returning the size XL(which gets virtually the same review).

names: Hi Ui Ewe iew Neil Sandage, GreatCTO, Chuck Bartowski
product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Very happy and Comfortable.

Keys a wallet and phone plus wrench at waist height, not ankles. Yet is not tight and uncomfortable. Well sized. Looking forward to draw strings being replaced by a different method. Stayed in the mental health place a few times. How about those bra strap or dress slacks hook and loop?
titles: Very happy and comfortable. Would like a Dress Pants, Hook and Loop.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Made in Honduras. I thought it was China because these shorts are terribly made. The waistband is scratchy and irritating and most of all it falls apart after a couple of washes. The threads that hold the waistband up were already fraying when it arrived. Figured it was just the extra thread, as some of these shorts may have from time to time. Unfortunately, in this case, they were just shoddily sewn together. I have two pairs of these and both have already been thrown out within six months.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I use these shorts for sport, walking and outdoor activities. I already bought 2 of different colors. The quality is very good, they tolerate well washing machine. I recommend them without any hesitation. They are super comfortable and cheap!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Been wearing these cotton shorts for a long time. They fit well and are cut slightly above the knee. The price was super - more than half compared to a local store. Highly recommend if you want comfortable shorts to knock around the house - and more. They wear well and wash/dry great.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The Champion Sports Shorts with pockets fits very well. I really like them. I've already bought a half-dozen Champion shorts and I've been very happy with them. They are very comfortable and great for walking. I would recommend them to others who like jogging or walking.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Comfortable. After a long day of working, these are what I slip into. Have owned several pairs over the years and it seems the new ones' material isn't as thick. I wear size 38 pants and have found the XL to be the best fit.
titles: Good lounging around the house shorts

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Perfect price, has stood up to a few washes now without shrinking, great no-frills shorts. Also appreciated how they don‚Äôt come quite as far down as basketball shorts, perfect for leg day. Will be ordering more soon I‚Äôm sure.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I bought the medium as I have a 34-35 Inch waist for pants. They give a little more than I like, but nothing terrible. I put my large iPhone in the pocket when on weight machine (I wanted pockets and cotton). Only later will I know if after long use and weekly washing will the elastic stretch out. After one week, they are ok.
titles: So far, so Good--a little streching on elastic, but not bad.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I bought these for my teenage sons. They love them and had me order more in different colors. I was worried they would be too thick for summer, but they are very light weight. You can't beat the price.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Good general work out - work around the house type of shorts. The fitting chart said I should order an XL rather than the 2XL I usually order.
By ordering the XL, I have less hip room. However, the waist is a great fit. Just pair of shorts ha fit snug in the hips.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I am actually a 32 waist, but prefer the small (28-30). It fits me perfect. I'm 5"11 and 156lbs. Just the right amount of drape when I stand and don't slide down, revealing my white upper thighs, like other sport shorts when I am doing floor exercises like situps. They dry fast too. These are the best shorts I've purchased in awhile.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I purchased these primarily for lying around the house. I already own a pair and just wanted another (since they don't tend to hold up for very long before the waistband starts to fall apart). I'm not expecting these to be any different but for the price, I couldn't go wrong. The size is as expected and they are soft... also, as expected. Decent bang for the buck.
titles: Comfortable for lying around the house

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Pros: fit properly, have pockets, seem durable
Cons: the material is a bit abrasive

These shorts are fine if you are looking for the jersey style. However, I find the material to be a bit uncomfortable and would definitely not recommend buying them unless the price dips below 10 bucks. I much prefer the mesh option.
titles: These shorts will get the job done

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts are great I purchased a pair same manufacturer same style about 2 or 3 years ago they still look like new when I found these I immediately bought 3 pair they are so comfortable and hold up so good I have no problem rating these
titles: The most comfortable shorts I've ever worn

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The size of these Jersey short ran very large. I ordered a medium and they are more like an X Large. I washed them thinking they would shrink however they are still way to large. Be careful when ordering.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The shorts are fine, but the draw string already broke after one day of wear. Why do companies even waste their time and out in the loop style draw string. Champion definitely cheaped out all the way. Throwing away and buying a better brand..

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I thought these would be more like light weight jersey material but they were thick heavy cotton. Not ideal for working out. Comfortable more for pajama shorts or working around the house.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I wanted cotton not polyester and got this. I have used hanes and fruit and loom too but this is far better in quality than those. Washed it several times but still like new. Very comfortable to wear 24/7from dusk till dawn. Go for a walk or do household chores. I love it.
titles: Very comfy all rounder shorts youcan wear 24/7

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Very fine product. Great feel. Lighter product for general or beach wear. The waist band is a little uncomfortable because I'm very sensitive in the lumbar area.. I prefer the Russell's because of that, otherwise these are a fine product. would still buy them again.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I searched for something like "sport shorts for men" and got this item. I mainly wear it to workout. The first time I wore it on, I found the edges of waistband too sharp and irritating on the waist. I have to cut it. Then, after two or three weeks, the crotch part was worn out. Considering the fact that I typically wear slim fit jeans, I don't think my legs would cause too much friction! If you are looking for something to wear for sports, this is definitely not a good choice.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Sorry I don't have a picture of my husband wearing it. May be he never wanted a pic of himself. But it fits him perfectly. He generally wears a Medium size and its a perfect fit.

I have washed it as well, and the colour doesn't bleed.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I am very unhappy with these shorts. I chose these men's shorts as none of the women's shorts were the length I wanted. I have had good luck with the brand before, so I am quite disappointed. Not only are they much shorter than stated - the inner waistband irritates my skin so that I have to wear a shirt tucked in - which is quite bothersome in the summer. I almost returned them based upon the shortness alone and CERTAINLY would have had I known of the waistband issue and had not already washed them.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I use my exercise bike every evening and needed a new pair of shorts. The medium fit was perfect and I like the looser leg opening for when riding my exercise bike. Would buy again.
titles: Great fit for using my exercise bike

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Their soft and fit ok but wish I had gotten one larger size. Just got them and haven't washed them yet so I don't know how they will be after they are washed. I would recommend them to others this far. They have a draw string on them if you need to tighten them up some.
titles: Champion Men's Jersey Short with Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I bought this unsure of weather I would even like this pair of shorts and to my surprise I love them, I am glad I bought 2 pair just in different colors. They are very comfortable.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These pants feel great and fit well as far as the waist goes. The legs are a little too long in my opinion, making me wear them further up than I normally would, but I have shorter legs. I typically stick to wearing them around the house but I still like them a lot.
titles: A little too long, but feel great

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: In this world where cotton is harder and harder to get, all cotton or 90% cotton is my go to for comfort. These are my favorites and I wear them all the time. Not fancy but comfortable and versatile for hanging out, biking, or just about any other casual activity.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: This was a gift but the recipient liked the Under Armour brand the best. However, they still liked the Champion brand as well and both brands had decent pockets which is a must.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These champion shorts are so great, very comfy, light to wear with no bothersome buttons on the waist or heavy feeling like some shorts feel, nice size pockets. will buy again

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Absolutely abysmal material quality and build design on these shorts. They fit like they should but it doesn't matter since I'll never wear them. Thought I was safe buying from a brand I recognized, but these shorts are not worth anywhere close to $10. I would happily pay a few bucks more to get something of quality. Exposed sandpaper elastic band and the cloth feels like you wearing a mcdonalds drive thru bag.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I bought these oversize so I could pull them up over Leg-Knee braces on both legs. They have a drawstring waist so I can sinch them up to fit. And they have two pockets which can be useful.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are the itchiest exercise shorts I‚Äôve ever purchased. The clothing tag and exposed elastic waist band next to the skin was not the best design idea for comfort. Itchy even after repeated washings. Can‚Äôt even stand to wear them to sleep in.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Forget about washing these shorts because they fall apart after one cycle through the laundry. Instead just wear 'em once and then chuck 'em in the garbage! Brilliant idea! Thanks Champion!
titles: Disposable Shorts - If you hate doing laundry these are for you!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The material is very thin and there are small holes along the seam of the seat. I bought a pair of these years ago and they were great quality. I have washed them dozens of times and they are still in good shape. I‚Äôm not sure what happened but these newer ones suck. I‚Äôm afraid to wear these to the gym for fear that they will tear apart while I‚Äôm squatting and get me banned from my gym.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are like cut-off sweat pants, not mesh basketball shorts. I kept them because they're comfortable to lounge around in, but that's about it. Not that the description was misleading, but had I realized before purchasing what material these were, I would have bought something different.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: They were less expensive than buying them from the Champion website but were not made as well. The fabric used in the shorts and the elastic at the waist were not the same quality as used in the shorts bought directly from Champion.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Have an old pair of champion shorts that were wearing out so I bought these. Was surprised to find that the material on new shorts was thinner than my old well worn pair then a few weeks later the drawstring breaks the original drawstring in my old shorts is still going strong.
As far as I'm concerned, these are garbage

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: My hose short that I live in all summer. Heavier weight fabric than most. Hold up well. Only reason I am replacing my three year old pairs is that Ihave lsot weight and need the next size down.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Doesn't appear to be particularly well made and fabric is lightweight. Hopefully it will hold up as well as Champion shorts I have owned in the past which have been excellent.
titles: Time will tell on how these hold up

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Nice shorts just poor quality fabric, very rough, the kind that snags in your skin. Would not buy again. Pockets are nice and length is good. Color was as expected.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I got these because I've gained a lot of weight because of medication I have to take after my heart surgery and strokes. They are soft and comfortable and inexpensive. My only complaint is that the inside waist band is rather course and itchy, so I make sure I tuck a shirt between them and me. Otherwise....I'd buy them again.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I decided to buy these Champion cotton shorts because the Russell shorts (I've purchased in the past) don't come in red. As others have noted the waistband isn't particularly comfortable, but more importantly for me, the inseam is too long (9"). I'm 6' 1" and they cover my kneecaps.

A sizing note - I purchased mediums (I have a 36" waist) because in my past experience with the Russells, I expected them to run large. I'd say they're truer to size than the other brand.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Nice thick waist band. Perfect length. Doesnt feel cheap. Ordered these and another pair in the same size in a different, cheaper common name brand and these were FAR superior to the other ones. Dont scrimp...get these. Youll be sorry otherwise. These fit true to size and didnt shrink afyer washing.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Alas my previous pair of shorts that I've had for many years developed a case of 'Swiss cheese'. Too many holes made it uncomfortable for my wife to be seen with me.
The shorts I bought as a replacement are the correct fit, very comfortable and extremely affordable. Let's hope there's no tariff imposed on them soon.
titles: The Champion shorts are very comfortable - great for kicking' around the house

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: They are a little longer than I expected and a tiny bit looser around my thighs (but just a minor preference). This isn't the most comfortable pair of shorts I own due to the elastic band being a bit rough but overall for the price not bad at all. I might buy another pair after I see how they ware down over the next few months.
titles: This isn't the most comfortable pair of shorts I own due to the elastic ...

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The waist ban has an elastic waistband that is exposed on the inside. I find the waistband to be rather itchy. Otherwise the shorts seem to be a pretty good quality.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Not the best choice to work out..more for going out because the fabric is kind of thick. No see through issues for sure like some basketball shorts. Great fit and comfort.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These will shrink about 1 size when washed---in my opinion. Almost a thin as t-shirt material! Rise is about correct but waist is somewhat small for the size (Large) I will be returning for XL. I will have to use these for sleeping shorts as they are too flimsy to wear outside. If this was heavier material they would be Perfect. Yes, I would pay more for heavier material! I Hate the newer 'in' shorts that hang down to mid-shin and look goofy on anyone older than 14. These are just above the knee and OK in that regard.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
These are cheap shorts and they look and feel like it! But you can find Nikes and Rebooks for the same price as these ones, so why bother? ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
They look and feel like the short you would use for sleeping.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: My husband loves these shorts. He says they're comfortable, the right length (he's not into capris :) and the waistband isn't binding. Would buy these again!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: SUPER cheap, and DEFINITELY not a 9" inseam as described. More like a 12 inch inseam, they fit like oversized basketball shorts well and hit well past the knee (and I'm 5'11" tall).
titles: Fits like oversized basketball shorts and super cheap

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I have older versions of this short. The material is as expected. The waistband material is stiff and scratchy even after washing several times. The tag is also very stiff and is out in a very inconvenient spot.

I will not purchase any more of this brand.
titles: Scratchy waistband and tag.....a constant irritant

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Bought these as shorts for my husband, as sitting around the house and just everyday relaxing, Running errands type of shorts. They're quite comfortable and they wash and dry very nicely No shrinkage or pilling Great Shorts at a great Price.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: While these are a good value, I have a pair I bought a few years ago I like better. These have a tag on the back that is scratchy and the way it's sewn in so well, I'm not able to get it off without concern about cutting into the waste band.
titles: scratchy label on back of waist band

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: GREAT fabric. Thick and soft. not rough. heavy enough to not be able to see through them. I use them to box in and they feel nice. I don't think about them at all once they are on. They stay on the waist. Not too tight. not constricting.
titles: I'm 5'10 150 lbs. I wear 31" pants. I got a medium and they are perfectly sized

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are basic shorts. The color has not bled into the wash. The waistband is a little on the thick side with the elastic, not uncomfortably so though.
titles: These are basic shorts. The color has not bled ...

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I've bought similar shorts from Champion before and these don't measure up. I bought 5 pair. The stitching that holds the waistband and cloth together has come apart on all the shorts. It's very poor. Since my previous shorts from Champion were of high quality and were worn a long time, I question if these may be knock-offs because of the very poor quality. The cloth is fine, the inner tie is fine, but the waistbands are quickly making these shorts useless.
titles: It's very poor. Since my previous shorts from Champion were of ...

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Got the shorts for 10$ so I don't care too much but these are the equivalent of very cheap gym shorts you get at school with the elastic waistband exposed. Wear some high waist undies with these because the elastic band causes serious irritation on the skin when you sweat.
titles: Cheap price and cheaper material used

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I bought these for the gym. Because of my belly, I ordered large which cover my knees. Unlike other pants and shorts, they have no trouble staying up, even on the treadmill. You don't know how embarrassing it is to drop trou while working out. And, they are well made.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
The fabric of the pants is not quality
End his to big
titles: The fabric of the pants is not quality

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are awesome. I bought 3 - and after wearing them, I bought 3 more. Arrived early, but the three came in 3 separate bags, go Amazon. Love them.
titles: These are awesome.  I bought 3 - and after wearing them, I bought 3 more.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: My husband likes to wear cotton knit shorts but they must have pockets so he doesn't have to change if he has to go out. These are perfect - comfortable and acceptable in public. The price is excellent and, best of all, the other (holey!) pair can be retired.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I'm in Arizona and I wear nothing but shorts from about April until October. These are by far the sturdiest and most comfortable brand I've come across. It's nice to be able to order the Champion brand on-line, rather than having to hit several stores to find them. I wear only black ones, but they also come in gray and navy. The shorts came in the mail today and I am quite happy with them. They fit fine and are less than half the price of a local retail store which, when it has them on sale, still asks more than twice what I paid for these.
titles: Comfort and a good fit for blazing hot Arizona summers!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I wear these at the gym. They're really inexpensive; they have pockets; and they're perfectly fine for the gym. With shorts you don't need high-tech, Under Armour kind of stuff. Spend your money on high-tech shirts.

I've used the non-pocket version of these shorts for three years without problems. But the pockets are a real improvement.

About the waistband... Yes, it's slightly scratchy, but honestly, if you're wearing boxers or briefs underneath (or if you're me at the gym and wearing bike shorts underneath), you won't notice it. And if you're going commando, that's on you.
titles: Fine for the gym and don't obsess about the waistband

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Excellent overall quality, except for the exposed white elastic waistband. The elastic waistband needs to be inside the short's fabric, not exposed. They fit nice and snug, but the rough elastic band irritates my skin. They are uncomfortable. I would not buy again.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I've only had these shorts for about a week and a half and only worn during sleep (off and on in the week) and as you can see in the picture, the yarn is already coming out. Has not been washed yet. Love the color and it's very comfortable but definitely cheap.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Not bad for around the house but not very comfortable because of waste band scratchy type but if you wear your shrit inside it don't matter , ok to sleep in ,
titles: Uhuh " okay for around the house

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I really like these basic cotton shorts with pockets. Super comfortable to wear for exercise or around the house. I've purchased about 5 pairs, all fit consistently well.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: They skimped on the quality to make it cheap. The pockets were sewn smaller than other Champion shorts I have bought at a store and the heft and weight of the cotton was much lighter. If I bought this off the street, I would think it is counterfeit.
titles: You get what you pay for.........

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I was very disappointed in these shorts. The waistband has the elastic just sewn on top of the outer fabric leaving it exposed which I found uncomfortable and the waist also rolled badly. I ended up giving them to the local clothes drive after a few months. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra $2-3/pair and get the Soffe shorts. Much better made, more comfortable and appear to be long wearing. Plus the waistband is actually properly made which means the elastic is surrounded by fabric inside and out.
titles: I was very disappointed in these shorts

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: This is a well made product. Sewing is tight. I purchased this pair of shorts several months ago and its gone through the wash numerous times. I can vouch for its durability. My husband loves wearing it often and for any occasion. I will be purchasing more very shortly. The fit is baggy, airy and loose around the legs but not frumpy. Its worth the money.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I love these shorts. Comfortable, durable and perfect for wearing about or just lounging. The pockets are nice and deep and keep my change and keys secure. I've had a few other pair that I bought 3 years ago and the elastic in the waist is just starting to get a little weak...even after weekly wear.

The price is great, too. Fit was just as expected.
titles: Great for active wear or lounging.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Good material . They are a little too large. Unfortuanately a med. would be too snug. Also the picture show the leg length above the knee. I'm 5'9 and the length is to the knee. A little too long for my liking, somewhat restricting my movement. I'll wash and dry a hope they shrink some.
titles: Too long but good for the price

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I have to admit I was scared of getting these shorts on line. But they fit and feel amazing. Only issue is the sting to tie then sucks. Feels cheap.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Shorts are hard to buy for people.This was a gift. We were very pleased to see an elasticized waist and with the same time string tie as in a bathing suit.It will make it much easier to adjust the waist band.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: It does not have a standard quality drawstring like the Champion sweatpants that I bought in around Spring of 2018 did. Apparently Champion can put a cheap useless one on any particular products and not others, even though there's no clue in the appearance and description. This is going to be sent back.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Material is so thin, it is almost as wearable as a lady's stocking. After I put on the shorts, I have gotten three holes in this flimsily made material. Not worth the money.
titles: Material is so thin, it is almost as wearable ...

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I don't like the way the waist band rolls up and how difficult it is unroll it to it's prior position. The pockets get tangled up with the waist band at the same time. I bought other brands and Hanes is the one I will keep buying in the future.
titles: Hate the way the pockets get rolled up with the waist band

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
i use it to eat and sleep.
People say its good for workout too. But o ratjer eat and sleep in these pants. They feel very comfortable.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Perfect for working out, I wore them to work once to see if anyone would notice I wasn't in office gear and no one said anything so they've got that going for them as well.
Also they really are very well made so if function over fashion is your thing, these are your jam.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Decent shorts for lounging 40 waist got 2 xl and they are a little big

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts fit great and feel great! I needed something to replace my former favorite basketball shorts (former because a hole finally tore through the material), and these feel more resilient, but just as comfortable. Recommended.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I have purchased these for a long time in my local store but they no longer carry them.
They fit as expected and are very comfortable!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I dont know if its the short or not but since owning it, I have become a better basketball player. Thanks a lot. I went 10-12 from the field in this short. Team won by 1pt. Love it.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The shorts were exactly what I was seeking. No problems at all with the shipping. The price was right. I prefer these type of shorts versus the new material they seem to be pushing. Plus, the prices of gym shorts now are ridiculous.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Bought these for sleeping in, and they don't work well for that. The elastic waistband is very rough and feels like sandpaper against the skin. Very uncomfortable.They would be fine if wearing underwear, but not for sleeping in. Returned.
titles: Elastic waistband too rough on the skin

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The tag sewn in the waste band scrapes my back. The tag in the butt crack was annoying so I tore it off and they are so poorly made that it left a hole.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: They feel like garbage. Nothing like I‚Äôd expect from this manufacturer. Too tight and much too coarse against my skin. I‚Äôll keep these around and wait till I loose all that weight from my upcoming meth addiction.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Fit well. Only thing I didn't like was the open not enclosed elastic wrist. Since I wear my shirt tucked in, this was a minor problem. A good buy.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are great for the price. They have pockets which is a plus. The price is good and they have held up over time and many washings. I even bought a second one in a different color.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are good quality fabric and nice stitching. The elastic waistband is a little scratchy on bare skin, but that's a small issue.
titles: Run a little large, are great quality

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: After only a couple of weeks, I've already had more than one of my multiple items begin to have the elastic waistband coming undone. I simply wear these around the house. They get little to no serious wearing, yet, they're already falling apart. Unfortunate.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: They shrank a little in length after washing on cold and drying in medium heat. No longer skimming the knee, think old school basketball shorts from the 80‚Äôs which may not be what you are happy with. I sleep in them, so I can live with it.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I thought I was getting a good deal - the quality level is commensurate to the price. Seams aren't covered inside like in better quality shorts. The product is decent though, at least out of the bag. I haven't washed it yet, so we'll see how well it holds up.
titles: The quality level is commensurate to the price.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I'm giving this a bad review because it says that they are JERSEY shorts but they are not they are just plain cotton shorts and I'm disappointed with what I received.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Just what I wanted. Extremely comfortable. Not dressy, not bummy. It will last a couple of summers and for the price that is all I expect. I have dress shorts and bum around the garden shorts - these just fit into that in- between - hanging around the house and just nice enough to wear to the grocery store. The pockets are just deep enough that my change, keys and phone don't fall out when I sit down. I bought one, then the day I got the first I ordered 2 more.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The fabric is nice weight, the shorts fit well, my *only* complaint is that the elastic is 'scratchy' against bare skin... they didn't wrap the shorts fabric around it and make it more comfy. I am happy with them otherwise and just recommend wearing a shirt between you & the shorts waist for max comfort. They look very nice on.
titles: Good quality affordable shorts with a minor complaint

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: My husband is diabetic and has loss quite a bit of muscle (especially in his thighs and legs, so his relaxed shorts (for sleeping and relaxing) were much tooooooo big. Ordered size 1X and they fit him just fine, (he went from a 2X to 1X) I believe a size XL would be even a better fit, but he likes a little room in his "relax, wearing around the house shorts". They fit fine in the waist and that's where it counts the most. Matter-of-fact I have ordered another pair in a different color as one of his gifts.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
These shorts are perfect for my husband to garden in and they wash up very nicely.
The last 3 pair of these shorts he purchased was 15 years ago and I finally said time for new ones. Lol.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Great shorts! Fits as expected. Washes well. Seems as though they will last for years. Love this brand. Nice material. Have bought 2 other pairs.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I have bought Champion for years and hardly ever disappointed. This are great for working out or just lounging around the house. Very few wrinkles and great fit.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts do the job as shorts. They are not that soft though, so do not expect them to feel like your favorite sweatpants.
titles: Functional though not the most comfortable ever

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: like i said they run big even with 90 cotton they don't shrink much. only down side is they are not as heavy weight as they used to be? Still OK

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Terrible quality, but you get what you pay for. Like wearing a paper towel with a rubber band for the waist.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Runs a little smaller than I like but wasn't too bad of a price for brand, will order larger sizes next time. Good quality.
titles: size varies no true to size for me

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: They rip if you stretch them too much. The waist band is rough and rubs against your skin.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I wear 34" pants and I wear size large in work out shorts. These larges would be loose on a 38" waist. I returned them and debating on whether to try size medium!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I love these old school cotton shorts. They are well made with nice medium weight cotton stock with deep pockets. My last pair lasted for years and these are headed in the same direction. Great quality at a great price if you like cotton like I do.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: It's a cliche, but it's true: You get what you paid for...and I wish I had paid a lot more. Like others have said, the material is very thin and the waistband feels like you're punishing yourself. Also fit tighter than other shorts the same size. Recommend spending a little more for better quality shorts.
titles: A big ol' bucket of nope

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Don't go by the sizing chart here. I took my waist measurement and ordered the size per the chart and they are way too big.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Draw string broke the second time I wore these shorts. Have had this problem before with these same shorts but it had been so long since then that I bought these again because of the price and forgetting about the string breaking.
titles: Draw string broke after first wash.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Spend a couple extra bucks and get a pair of shorts that are soft and comfortable. These are scratchy and cheap fabric. They run smaller than expected.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I love these shorts and have purchased approximately 20 pairs of them they're comfortable they fit in a good size and they're pretty good looking for the gym

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: You guys can check the pictures posted by others. It basically the same the you see from these pictures. One thing makes me satisfied is the price.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I have bought and used several pairs of these shorts. I at least 3 or 4 instances, the drawstring for the waste has failed. They were not properly sewn in at the back of the shorts waste band. So far my recent purchases seem to be ok.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Great fit for my 12 yr old son. They‚Äôre comfortable and do not fade (washed several times) I ordered these shorts twice. Cheap, and good quality.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: My son is 5‚Äô9, they run a little short on him but he loves them! They are great for working out and he wears them when he mows the lawn.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: My husband loves these. He wears them around the house and to do yard work and says they fit good and are comfortable

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I can where an XL in athletic shorts but i buy a size up because I like my shorts to be roomy. These are really good shorts and you can't beat the price. good quality and good fit!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I wanted more of a synthetic material and this is a cotton material. I prefer not to use these for workouts since they just absorb water/sweat.
titles: Good for what they are, but not what I was expecting

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: This is my first time buying shorts on amazon, and for athletic shorts, I don't like getting the mesh kind, or the ones that are fully cotton. So I was a little skeptical because I can't touch the material to see if it's the kind of athletic shorts that I like. Well, it turns out that it is and I lucked out. Champion makes really nice shorts and these are definitely a great value. You should get these shorts.
titles: I don't like getting the mesh kind

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Because I bought it cheaply, I bought it, but the thread of the elastic band that I haven‚Äôt worn a few pants is fully open. If you don‚Äôt have trouble returning, you can buy it.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I love these and have several pair for lounging or working around our very hot Florida yard. Comfy and inexpensive!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: My husband loves to wear these around the house.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Good material. Ordered a large and that are closer to an extra large. A good fit if you‚Äôre overweight. I‚Äôm not. The insides of the elastic waistband is very uncomfortable and scratchy, possibly due to nylon thread or material. I can only hope a washing or two softens it up.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Champion shorts are usually my favorite, they used to do a wrapped waistband so the elastic was inside the nice soft jersey. Not on these, it's just the bare elastic, still ok but not like they used to be.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are COTTON sleep shorts, NOT basketball shorts. These are a bit on the shorter side. Would be fine for sleeping in, not for public.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I use these shorts to sleep in, they hold my insulin pump in the pockets while I sleep. I also use them to lounge around in during the day.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: good shorts for walking in, a little too long for some people to use in running but likely personal taste on that.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I bought three colors and husband likes these shorts. Waistband is soft as are the shorts, and husband is picky about soft clothing and he approves. Therefore, five stars because of
softness and good price.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Scratchy elastic of the waistband really digs in and feels uncomfortable. If you have sensitive skin don‚Äôt buy these.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Yeah if you want shorts that will come apart within a few weeks of purchase, these are the shorts for you. Seriously within a month they started to literally unravel. As in the threads holding the elastic to the waistband came off and the two parts separated. Also they are incredibly uncomfortable.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Couldn't get the rugby shorts anymore so I got these. Similar fit as the rugby but much thinner material. My Champion rugby shorts lasted many years as gym/yard work/laying around shorts. Hopefully these last as well.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: WASTE OF MONEY! DON'T BUY!Horrible quality. Waistband stitching starts to unravel on the first day and they were completely useless by the second washing. Champion is garbage. There is another brand sold on Amazon I purchased at the same time called Soffe. Wish I had purchased more of the Soffe shorts instead of throwing away my cash on these.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I really like these. You can't find them in stores. I really looked from Walmart to Kohls. The fabric is not as thick
as I would like but I like stuff that last 100 years. Really why can't they make Men's underwear last at least 20 years.
I think you will enjoy your purchase. I plan on purchasing this again. They work great for around the house and sleepwear.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts are hard on the waist. Its straight rubber elastic. Leaves a mark on your waist even with underwear on. Terrible.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Decent shorts. Waist band can be uncomfortable if it's on bare skin, otherwise they are fine. Sewn on symbols.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Comfortable, but the draw string broke very easily and left me with shorts I can only wear around the house. Before that, I enjoyed them a lot.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: my husband loves these shorts to wear around the house. they are very comfy but still look fine if someone stops by, he takes the dog out, etc. Easy to order and quick to ship, not a bad price either

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Excellent Fit! Very comfortable for lounging around the house or for working out. The cotton feels good--not too soft or coarse. I use these shorts mostly for working out and I love them. AND the price is great.

Great buy and an excellent price. Better than some that I paid double. the amount

review_contents: Put on when I got them they were nice and big, after wash they are about a 2xl. My size but if I was a bit bigger I would not get into them. Purchased mainly to sleep in at Scout camp. Buy them 1 size bigger than you need.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Great fit. At first the elastic waist band was a bit rough. I had bought another brand of shorts at the same time as this pair. It had a narrower and softer waist band, and they would slip down as I walked. This pair does not slip, even with several dollars worth of assorted coins in the pockets and a small set of keys. After a few washings the waist band softened and is more acceptable. Will be ordering more of this brand next time I need shorts.
titles: Great fit. At first the elastic waist band was ...

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: My husband practically lives in these shorts. He loves them. It is so easy to just reorder them through Amazon. He gets the right fit and material content every time.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

review_contents: Everything is good and worth the money. The only thing that bothers me is the waistband. The waistband is harsh and gives a scratchy feeling on your skin. Overall it still worth the money, if you don't mind about the scratchy feeling.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Was gonna give these 4 stars, but you know what, for the price - giving them 5.

100% cotton. They are light weight, not thickly woven, so if youre looking for a heavier weave of cotton, get another short. But then again, you won't find something that thick for the price.

They are a light grey, I use them for bball, gym and just going down the shops. I will order more.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Why pay a pricey amount of money just to play a game. These work fine for the money. Even though they came somewhat larger than I expected. I haven't had them fall down so that's good. You might want to get the next size down than you normally order..I have a 36 waist and ordeered the extra large. They come with pockets that I like too.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Junk, It can't be the name brand - feels like paper. Don't buy

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I like them a lot but the tag is super scratchy. I'll have to see if I can cover it or tag it off.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: They are very comfortable for around the house they are to short and big legs. Wouldn't buy again.
titles: Comfortable for around house too SHORT

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Husband loves them to lounge or run to the store great soft fast shipping washes well dried well !!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Nice shorts the rope was a bit too long and legs a bit long but very soft and well made. Hubby likes them

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Material is thinner/lighter weight than expected. Rugby shorts are better but were out of stock.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Great pair of shorts for exercise or just kicking around the house, I‚Äôve been wearing them for years, always fit great and last for a reasonable length of time. Good value!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I do not think these shorts are an authentic Champion product, but just a pair of generic cotton shorts with a pseudo-authentic label sewn onto the waist band. No tags attached like the other pairs I've previously purchased.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Get what you pay for I guess. Even with very LIGHT pressure the drawstring WILL break do don't expect to rely on that to keep these shorts snug around your waist during any kind of activity. 3 out of 4 pairs of shorts, worn twice, have broken the draw string. Pretty cheap stuff, would expect more from Champion brand clothing.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are very comfortable shorts. They are a little longer in the legs than some previous athletic shorts I have owned in the past, but I still like them. I have worn these shorts daily for several months now with frequent washings in between wearings. The material is holding up just fine to the abuse I put them through. I will be be buying more of these in the very near future. I own two pair each of the blue and oxford grey colored shorts.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I love this type of material and these are my favorite pair of shorts. Would recommend to everyone.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Good quality, good fit, ample pocket. Nice range of colors. Good for men and women. Liked them so much bought a pair in every color. My new summer wardrobe.
titles: Excellent buy-good price, good quality, good fit

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: As others have mentioned, the white elastic waistband is exposed and not covered with cotton. This causes irritation after wearing them a short time. Would not reorder under any circumstances.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The inside waistband is uncovered rigged rubber and extremely uncomfortable.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Great working around the house shorts. Will definitely be getting more. Fits nice. Good quality

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Used to be good shorts. Quality way under previous ones I‚Äôve purchased. I just wear them around the house and on the treadmill. Started fraying and falling apart after the first wash. Finally threw them in the trash when the fabric started falling off the elastic. Too bad because I like the fit.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Comfortable for daily and sports use. They are cool and I can even use them in casual outings.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I had previously bought this in another color and knew that they run large so I ordered a small instead of a medium. It fit me perfectly. I have a 31 or 32 waist. I think they would be too much for the really skinny guys. Otherwise it is a fine product.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: the material is not soft and tag is hard ! My husband told me he was really painful want to tag scratch him.not good at all

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I bought these shorts to replace the same ones that I've had for which finally wore out after 10 years. I love these gym shorts! Very comfortable to wear when working out or just around home.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These fit pretty well, and I am a fat guy. No complaints. Came back and bought a second pair.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Bought for my dad, he likes them, he says they're soft and fit comfortably around the waist.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Great especially for the price! True to size. Light weight. Pockets are longer...phone won't slip out like most "sport" shorts!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I waited almost a year to post this review to see how these shorts held up. I kept the Russell Athletic Men's Cotton Performance Baseline Short and they‚Äôve held up well. The only thing I‚Äôd improve is the draw string. I think it‚Äôs interesting to notice that the big box retailers are selling similar shorts now. Prior to finding these shorts online, shorts of this style weren‚Äôt available at the big box retailers.

Russell Athletic Men's Cotton Performance Baseline Short
Russell Athletic Men's Cotton Performance Baseline Short
Depending on the color, 100% cotton. Very nice loose fit that‚Äôs not too loose.

Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
Very tight waist band. Tightest fit of all.

Soffe Men's Classic Cotton Pocket Short
Soffe Men's Classic Cotton Pocket Short
Not as loose fit as the Russell. The way the shorts are sewn at the waist almost creates a pleat, which feels odd compared to the Russell.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I‚Äôm a woman and still bought these because they‚Äôre comfortable and not many shorts are long enough. Love the pockets.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: i bought these shorts for my husband and he simply loves them, i will definitely buy again.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Better off using your amazon box as shorts. These things are stiff and rough as 80 grit sandpaper. The elastic band is so abrasive it took my pubes off.
titles: Better off using your amazon box as shorts

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: wear around house, out for bike rides in neighborhood. super comfortable and light; look good.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Definitely worth the price and seem to (so far) hold up with washing. My waist can vary due to health conditions and these are working admirably for that need.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: The laces broke within 1 use. The shorts are now unusable. This is a cheap piece of crap. Amazon won‚Äôt let me return it because it‚Äôs been too long and I‚Äôve used it once already. Save your money and buy better quality shorts.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I am so elated to get these shorts! They are great to sleep in, run in, or just work out in the gym.
Way Go Champion you've done it again.
GLJ- CA

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I buy these to sleep in. Fabric is light and cool, soft. Elastic holds well, doesn't bind. Fit as expected. A bit long -- but that's the fashion these days. I might take a scissors to them at some point -- bring them up 2" and sew a hem.
titles: Fabric is light and cool, soft

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
It's not a super thin and flimsy material, which is what I'm seeing more and more of these days. It's about the same thickness as a thicker pair of pajamas.

It's a tiny bit on the large side, so if you are one of those guys like me, that sometimes wears large and sometimes medium, get the medium on this one.

It's not soft on the inside, so if you are particular about materials and need a "supima" type feel, avoid. But for a simpleton like me, works great and was a good price at about $9.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts are not only inexpensive, they're cheap - cheaply made, that is! Frankly, I was shocked that a reputable brand like Champion would allow their name and logo to be associated with such a poor quality product. I doubt I will ever trust a product based upon the Champion brand name in the future. Very poor quality - keep shopping, don't waste your money on this product!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are ok for working in the garage but that is about it. The material is a heavy cotton which is terrible for any kind of exercising. The waist band is old school elastic, not super comfortable. I would NOT buy these again.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Material is not rugged. I bought it for loungewear, so fine around the house and walks.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I like 100% cotton. At 10$ a pair vs 30$ for nike, the champion is as good as the nike

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I had 3 pair of these short that lasted well over a decade. Due to some recent painting projects I needed replacements. I looked everywhere to find new ones which I eventually found on Amazon. I love the cotton blend and Champion is one of the few brands still making them. I'm a 42 waist and the XL fits perfect, no shrinkage from the dryer either. These are by far the most comfortable workout or lounge around the house shorts out there.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These were awful. The waistband was very stiff and uncomfortable. The shorts developed a hole during the first use.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are great generic shorts. I've been using them to workout and they are ok. They do run kind of big, so you might want to get them in a smaller size. They are comfy and the pockets are pretty deep so I really like that. However, the cord for adjusting them on the hips broke literally the first time I used them. Overall they are an ok cheap and comfy short, but I really think that if you are looking for something that will last you should look for something else.
titles: Comfy, but I don't think they'll last long.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets

I'd recommend and purchase again.

Not returning because it's not worth the trip to the UPS and I don't want some 6 year old in El Salvador to lose her fingers.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: If you are looking for a great pair of house shorts, look no more. These jersey knit 100% cotton house shorts are everything my husband was hoping for. They have good thigh coverage (to the knee), 2 deep side pockets and an elastic waist with draw string for comfort. The price was great considering what they were charging for Champion shorts in the retail stores. One more thing, they wash and dry without losing their shape. It was a great choice for us.

review_contents: The waistband is super uncomfortable and the tag hurts like hell, and it can‚Äôt just be ripped out as it‚Äôs sewn all around into the waistband. Also, these shorts are really thick and hot. Will not be buying again.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I bought these shorts in the expectation that I was getting a good-looking modern update of the classic draw-string shorts. They DO in fact look good, but they've got a fatal flaw that sooner or later will leave them around your ankles instead of around your waist!

All the draw-string shorts I've seen in the past have a single piece of cord running around the waist where a belt would be. This makes sense, as all you have to do to tighten the waist is to tie the two cord ends together, pulling on that initial "crossover" knot to tighten the cord, then finish it into a bow or granny or whatever knot to keep it in place.

The designer of these shorts, however, must have been on drugs or liked to play cruel practical jokes on people: the length of cord is moved 180 degrees around the waist, with the two ends meeting inside the waistband at the *back* of the waist, and no break in the cord up front where it forms a loop, coming out of (and going back into) the waistband.

The ends are anchored with just a few weak stitches, so here's what happens when you try to tighten the cord by pulling on the loop up front: one or the other of the ends pulls free of the weak stitches holding it in place, and you end up with half a cord in your hand, pulled all the way out of half the waistband! This is the point at which the shorts drop down around your ankles...
titles: Looks good, but has a fatal flaw

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I find it so amusing that people pay $8 for a pair of shorts including shipping and they want them to be the same quality as their PE shorts from the 1950's that were made in the USA and sold for $15 in those days. I bought a couple pairs of these at TJ MAXX a couple of years ago but in those days they were cotton/poly blend (the fabric varies by color, so order navy or black if you want cotton). I really like the 100% cotton - it's soft. And thick enough... it's heavier than t-shirt fabric but not like the heavy sweatshirt jersey fabric, but I don't want to wear a sweatshirt dress, I just want some decent shorts to work out in. I have washed and dried them once and there was minimal shrinkage. I will update this review if they don't wear well but at this price I view these as good shorts that will hopefully last a year or two.

Also the fit seems to come up in the reviews.... the waist is true to size, so if you're a L, order a L. The length is a standard short, hits me about 2 inches above the knee, but if you are looking for a shorter short that's mid-thigh or higher, these are not the shorts for you.

Yes, it would be great if these were made in the USA and hand sewn etc but if you want that, prepare to spend $40 for a pair of shorts.

Hope this helps. I just ordered 2 more pairs.
titles: Decent quality - come on, these are less than a price of a box of popcorn at the movies!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts were exactly what we have come to expect from Champion. High quality fabric, perfect fit, nice colors, came in two days as promised. We couldn't be happier!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Like many wives, I pick out most of my husbands clothing. He was down to just one pair of shorts and so I found him these.

Things to know;

1. I picked the red for him, he likes a bright color and these are a nice, primary red. Not orange/red or wine red, just Elmo red. I know the clolor says burnt brick, but they are not the darker, brownish red that I was thinking they'd be, which was a bonus, I really like my husband in red.

2. The shorts have an elastic waist. The elastic is pretty sturdy, I can't see this slipping down as he works around the house or takes these out for a brisk Saturday walk.

3. They are walking length or whatever it is they call it now. The shorts hit right at his knee. I've noticed men's shorts getting longer and longer until they are a man version of the dreaded old lady capri pants (but without the little fashion slit on the side and usually not in pastel shades of aqua and lemon). When I was at the Farmer's Market a few weeks ago I just about died giggling when I saw a woman in her sixties wearing a pair of tan capris crossing the street at the same time as a guy wearing a Punisher t-shirt and a pair of the long khaki shorts that look like capris or manpris as I call them. The only difference was that his had pockets and hers didn't, they really did look like a matched pair!

4. They are machine washable and dryable. I've had a few mishaps with clothes over the years, usually with them fading or shrinking, but these shorts have stayed the same through several washes.

Excellent, basic, good quality shorts.
titles: Nice shorts for a lovely price.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
The tie strings are sewn into the back and come loose when tying them. The older ones DID NOT do this. Don't waste your time until they fix this problem as it happened with two different colors I got from amazon over the last year and was almost an immediate occurance during the initial use.

Follow up 06/20/19:
The one pair that didn't have the drawstring problem is starting to get holes through the fabric already as well as has stitching coming out of it in a few spots around the waistband. Seeing I do not wear them more than once every couple weeks, and not doing anything that would destroy them, I'm guessing the quality has dropped from the first couple shorts I purchased made by champion. I guess it is time to try another brand.
titles: If you want defective tie strings get these shorts.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts at least had elastic in the waist, which has become more and more rare these days, but they probably shrank to half their original size with the first washing. And they simply have a weird cut and fit. The legs seem to have a strange taper above the knee, and the rise REALLY shrank up, so that now they simply have a weird, binding, uncomfortable fit. Fruit of the Loom shorts seem to have no elastic waist anymore, and the once excellent Russell brand also no longer seem to have elastic. Like so many other things in the USA, the quality of "goods" has plunged to zero. Sad.

review_contents:
Good quality for good price. Not bulky (hot) like more expensive ones, but not thin and cheap either.
Bought two pair and washed them before wearing.
Little to no shrinkage after hot wash, cold rinse, normal (heated) dryer setting.

These look better on skinny people like me (my waist is 28" or 29") because they are long enough to reach the knees when worn at the hips.
No more pulling my shorts down.
Just ordered three more.

I will never buy Champion Men's Jersey Shorts again, and I would advise you not to, as well!!!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I really like most things about these shorts with two notable exceptions...primarily is the scratchy inside elastic band. I don't like to tuck my shirts in, but I have to with these shorts if I want to be comfortable. If they had just wrapped the inside band in the same manner in which they wrapped the outside band with the same material as the rest of the shorts, then I believe they would have been very comfortable. As it is, it feels like wearing sandpaper around my waist. A more minor disappointment is the "loop" drawstring that "twirls" and cannot be straightened. I much prefer a drawstring that is not a complete circular "loop." Also, the drawstring is white and not to color. I'm not a fan of that either.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Pockets are always a plus, so are draw strings. But as others have noted in the reviews the drawstring is fixed at the back seam which is very unfortunate because if the string breaks that's pretty much it unless one can sew and remove a few stitches and resecure a stitch above and below the target whereby one can thread the string through the seam area and make it a true draw string. The length is fine, fabric is thin but because of that they will be cool. The price is right for possible short life span one might expect from thin fabrics.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Overall a good item. Fits as expected, not too short as these kind of shorts can be sometimes Kinda and very good quality material and build. The only downside I can think of is that the waistband has a tag sewn into it and there is a label about halfway down the back seam of the shorts. It's easy to cut that label out, but the tag on the waistband can be felt and it's something I don't see very often in shorts like these anymore.

That being said, I would still recommend these as they are higher quality than other similar items at this price point
titles: Good product at this price point

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Like many people, I bought one pair of these and one pair of the similar Russell Athletic shorts with pockets. To compare. I clearly like the Russell shorts better. These Champion shorts are entirely too baggy and large. I bought a medium size and while the waist size is appropriate, the legs are big enough for an NFL linebacker - two of them. They look a bit ridiculous on my thin legs. Also, the waistband is very stiff and uncomfortable against bare skin. I wish I had bought more of the Russell shorts instead...
titles: Find a better pair of shorts.

Cons: Thin material, started pilling after one wash, extremely scratchy and exposed waistband (most other brands cover the band).

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I ordered 2 pairs of these. The Navy ones are indeed 100 % cotton; the Granite Heather are 60% cotton despite what it says in the description. Considering that I went looking specifically for 100% cotton, the Granite ones are useless from the beginning. Now, for the idiotic design, common to both pairs, that jumps at you when you see the inside:
1. The elastic band sewed at the waist, which is synthetic material, and pretty wide, is completely exposed, instead of being covered with cotton.
2. The tag is a large, scratchy piece of material that is sewed over the elastic band at the back.
What should have been a pair of very comfortable shorts, was destroyed by some designer who should have not been in the fashion industry ..., or in any industry for that matter.
I don't think the price justifies the disastrous design, because I would have refused these even if somebody would have offered them to me for free.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Doesn't it seem that everything is poorly made these days??? These shorts included. They are super thin material and what is worse is the fact that the tie string is stitched in the rear of the shorts rather than having the string loop all the way around. This stitch method breaks if you pull the string too tight and you find your shorts down at your ankles. Moreover, the string itself is flimsy. What a joke. Find a quality pair of shorts and skip these.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: At first these were great but within 24 hours all three pairs had the same issue. The stitch inside the elastic unravels and the elastic band falls off from the shorts. And u can't sew it to prevent it. Basically I wasted my money. :-(
