product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I too discovered that these shorts are not 100% cotton. Yuck.
Maybe it's the heather colors - I ordered gray heather. They're going right back.
Wish I'd read the reviews first - didn't notice till I came back that someone posted this same thing.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Maybe it's been changed but as of last week when I ordered, the copy describing the item is WRONG. Says it's all cotton but it's not.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: it went straight to the garbage. it looks pretty cheap. the good thing is that i did not pay a lot.
titles: glad did not pay a lot

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I generally don't use Amazon to purchase clothing but I wanted to give it a try. I had bought exactly the same shorts from Macy's a while ago and I decided to add another to my collection. Honestly, I was skeptical about the fitting and the quality of the shorts. However, after I got these I found they are exactly similar to the ones I bought at Macy's.

Fabric:
The fabric is mostly cotton and is very comfortable to wear on hot summers. Sometimes I sleep in these shorts and I find it amazingly smooth and cozy. The elastic is very comfortable and doesn't leave a mark on the waist after wearing it the whole day.

Pockets:
The pockets are fairly big and you can place your phone in it. However, I wouldn't recommend putting your phone in these pockets if you are running, it will juggle around. Additionally, don't expect it to hold heavy items, they could tear after a while.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Ordered a Medium for my 5‚Äô2‚Äù 134lb almost 10 yr old son, but these run VERY big, especially in the legs. There is a drawstring, but it isn‚Äôt very effective. The material is scratchy. The pockets ARE deep and nice, you can fit a cellphone in the pocket, which is good. But they need improvement. Starting with the sizing, the legs are SO loose! The waist is big also, but the legs? Wow. I washed and dried these, hoping to soften them up, however they feel the same. I suppose it comes down to how picky one is, they are cotton (a good thing), quite breathable, and if you prefer very loose, large-fitting legs then you will love these! My son is VERY picky about his fabrics, and he was not very enthused about these. Still for the price, they‚Äôre not the worst, just wish they would have been smaller in the legs and most of all, that the material was not so scratchy! Not his ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù shorts, but wearable.
Note; I‚Äôm just shy of 5‚Äô10‚Äù, and weigh between 140-145lbs, and they are down to mid-knee on me! The Med is HUGE.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts were a disappointment in every way. They were a little too short, the material was a little thin and flimsy, and worst of all the stitching in the back around the tag and seam felt like steel wool scratching at my back constantly. I threw them in the donate bag after about a month of trying to get used to them, they just weren't worth it. I will say that the fit was about as expected, and the front pockets were deep and useful, but overall I would much rather pay more for better shorts than throw away the few bucks that these cost. Hard pass.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
I generally don't use Amazon to purchase clothing but I wanted to give it a try. I had bought exactly the same shorts from Macy's a while ago and I decided to add another to my collection. Honestly, I was skeptical about the fitting and the quality of the shorts. However, after I got these I found they are exactly similar to the ones I bought at Macy's.

Fabric:
The fabric is mostly cotton and is very comfortable to wear on hot summers. Sometimes I sleep in these shorts and I find it amazingly smooth and cozy. The elastic is very comfortable and doesn't leave a mark on the waist after wearing it the whole day.

Pockets:
The pockets are fairly big and you can place your phone in it. However, I wouldn't recommend putting your phone in these pockets if you are running, it will juggle around. Additionally, don't expect it to hold heavy items, they could tear after a while.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Not the best pair of shorts I've owned, but considering I got for $6 on Prime Day, I can't complain too much about it. The value for the price is good.

The L fits for me extremely well as someone with thicker legs and a usual 34-36 waistline depending on the pants/shorts.The elastic band around the waistline is noticible as other reviews have pointed out, but for me it doesn't stand out as irritating as other people have. Your mileage may vary.

I've worn these to the gym a few days now and it's held up well with stretching and not getting in the way despite doing exercises like squats, burpees, lunges, etc. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a decent cheap pair of gym shorts.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Excellent fit and not the cheap material covered waist band that Russell now uses. Champion has the true elastic waist band and fits well so you don't have to use the drawstring. I wore nothing but Russell shorts for years but they recently changed the design. Russell covered the elastic band with fabric and changed the overall fit. The Russell mediums are now too large so that you are forced to tie the drawstrings (I have a 33 waist) and the legs are gigantic. I tried a Russell small but they were too small. Even the look of the covered elastic waist band of the Russell short is not appealing. The old design just had a loop built into the waist that you could pull and tie if you needed to but it wasn't necessary because the elastic waist band was perfect. I ended up purchasing the Champion brand. Champion has the elastic band waist that Russell used to have and the fit and look is similar to the old Russell design. I recommend Champion shorts now. I have been wearing the Champions now for over a year and they are very durable. I still do not notice any wear. The fabric is just the right thickness and they are comfortable.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These are possibly the most comfortable shorts I've ever owned, but...durability is lacking so minus one star. The string broke on both pairs, one in the dryer and once putting them on with a half knot started so kinda my mistake on that pair. I think you just need to make sure there is no knot in the string before putting any tension on the waistband and you'll be okay. Despite this I've ordered another couple pair because they are my go to chill/workout shorts and they're still usable when I'm hanging at home.
titles: Super Comfortable but String Is Delicate!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I bought four pairs of these jersey shorts for my husband, and he loves them. The fabric is soft, they wash and dry well, and they fit just the way he likes. He likes pockets and these have two. So glad to have found these again on Amazon; my husband hates to go clothes shopping for himself (will help me anytime) so I'm always happy when I am able to find clothing he likes and that fit well! So glad they were available in assorted colors in his size.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts are long. Really long. I'm 5'8" and they're probably 4" too long for comfortable workout shorts. The fabric feels really cheap and synthetic. I'm amazed that they're actually cotton. I've bought better shorts from Adidas, and Underarmour.
titles: Too Long and feel like polyester

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
The elastic band inside the waist has a serated edge that cuts into my skin. Pulling it on, it feels like a metal comb. Adjusting it feels like a saw blade. Ouch! I bought 3 colors and all do it. These are going back.

The material is thinner, not really suitable for outdoor use. More like sleep shorts. I got M and L sizes, which seem the same size - in fact, the L measures slightly smaller unstretched! Finally the different colors have varying cotton content. Weird.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: excellent value. the material feels like a combo of polyester and cotton, not saying it is, but that is what it feels like. If you are expecting long length basketball shorts, these are not it. Take a good look at the picture to see how high they are above the knee. You tighten with drawstring. The elastic around the waist is a little bit on the cheap side and will probably stretch itself out, but at this price, you an buy another.
titles: really comfortable, wished the shorts actually went down to my knees

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: It‚Äôs a bit big for my size of 32" waist, I ordered a small. The product is itchy and uncomfortable, it is too thin. If it was any thinner it would become see through. It feels very cheap and low quality. Not what I expected!!
titles: It is Very Cheap And LOW QUALITY!!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I‚Äôm a woman who hates the short or skin-tight women‚Äôs athletic shorts. The men‚Äôs small is perfect for my 5‚Äô3‚Äù, 130 pound frame. Love these shorts!

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:

Quality superb.
I might have gone for a smaller size, but figured "off shore goods".
I'm not returning them, but you should plan on roominess, and don't order above your size!

Because of this situation I bought this short small, however it is very small.. I hate to guess everytime if it will fit good or not while buying a cloth from internet. Champion‚Äôs sizes are so bad. review_contents: Comfortable material and cut. Reasonably priced. Champion is an indispensable brand for people who don't want to spend a lot of money on flashy logos. It's a time-tested line of athletic clothing.

review_contents: Love these shorts to wear around the house or bed. You could absolutely wear these out to play sports or run to the store. Very lightweight and not heavy at all. review_contents: I PURCHASED THESE SHORTS FOR MY HUSBAND AND HE IS VERY PLEASED WITH THEM. HE SAID THE FIT IS PERFECT AND THAT THEY'RE VERY COMFORTABLE. I KNOW WE'LL BEING BUYING MORE OF THESE !!

review_contents: I ordered one size up, the shorts do you shrink. I don't know if they're going to keep on shrinking but just in case I'll dry at lower setting. The waistband doesn't bother me, yet I'm not the type of person that gets bothered with tags.

review_contents: For the price, they're great. Seem durable and fit as expected. The only ding is the sharp edge on the bottom side of the waistband, It's hard to describe "sharp edge" but if you go commando, which I don't, expect some possible irritation and serious cording along your waistline.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Normally I wear size medium but I have a cast on my leg right now so I ordered a size large to slip over it and that one bump up in size worked a charm. Loose enough to slip on and tight enough to stay up in place. Just with the elastic waistband by itself without using the pull string tension loop.

The jersey fabric is much thinner than the typical fleece sweat pant material and there is no silk liner in these, so it makes it comfortable to sleep in without sweating in them. I can sleep the night thru and wake up dry, unlike sweatpants.

The two side pockets are deep enough that keys, etc won't pop out while doing any athletic activity and they are Not sewn to the body of shell so the pockets can be pulled out just like the Levi's style pockets. From the waist these hang just above the knee's an inch or two. They are not the extra long perforated polyester type basketball shorts.

At this price it is worth it to replace your boxers just for sleeping in.
titles: A Good and Comfortable pair of Men's shorts

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents:
Iv been rocking athletic shorts for years. Always Adidas, Nike, and UA 7" polyester/nylon etc. Recently fell in love with champion and First time Iv tried out the Jersey. They're pretty comfy. Gonna use them as an underlayer this winter. Expecting great success.

Pro-tip For the unaware Winter dweller, Athletic shorts make for a great under layer beneath your jeans/pants during the winter. When you get home to take off your Wet/cold/sloshy/snowy boots and remove your jeans/pants that have 1-10" of soaked ankle/legging it feels great to already be wearing a nice pair of warm shorts. Your'e welcome.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: Awesome pair of shorts. I ordered a medium and for me they were a little long (but I like my shorts pretty short). After putting them through the wash they fit perfect for me. The shorts are a little on the thin side so if you're looking for a thicker pair of shorts I would maybe look somewhere else, but for only like 10 bucks I can't complain at all. Overall I love these shorts and they match with everything. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for some affordable casual shorts!
titles: Great shorts for a great price

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: I am a large guy, 6ft with a belly. I have been buying these sorts for about 10 years now, mostly for the elastic waist. The threads on the top unravel, but other than that, I like these shorts and will continue to buy them.

product_name: Champion Men's Jersey Short With Pockets
review_contents: These shorts fit well and the price is excellent. I bought 5 of these. Only complaint is the tag is inside the short. I made a mistake on the first short of cutting the tag too close and hence the stitching came apart creating a small hole on my backside... So be careful if you are cutting the tag to leave a little bit on there. All my other 4 shorts are great and after a few washes they hold up really well.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
This is a $10 fabric scrap sewn into a tube. I thought it would have elastic band edging for security, but instead it literally came with raggedly cut edges that look like a child cut it with safety scissors, and they were not even hemmed. Completely sloppy.

I had hoped this was a relatively inexpensive time-saver, because I don't have time to go to the store for fabric and lug out my sewing machine, but clearly not. Now I'll have to go to the store for elastic and finish it myself anyway, so I ended up spending $10 on fabric that should have cost about $1.

Don't waste your money on this product. If you don't have a sewing machine, someone you know does and could make you this properly for less money.

If it's warmth you need, don't bother, it's too thin. If it's dust protection, don't bother, also too thin and will fall down anyway. I got it to keep dust off my hair in a wood shop, but without elastic, it has to be pinned to my head.
titles: Make your own for less money and better quality.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Moisture wicking is very important when buying a face mask. They do work as a medical mask. The gaiter seems a bit tight at first but it does stretch just enough to be comfortable & stays up. I wear it around my neck as a scarf to pull it up as I may need it. I bought several for my family. I also spoke w/Doc before buying confirming they will work. The key is moisture wicking!! Thx. Best wishes to everyone!! Stay safe!! Jay

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: I bought this to use as a Corona Virus mask and it works well. I fold up a paper towel to put between my mouth/nose and the mask. I make small diagonal folds at the upper corners of the towel so that there is a little bulk at the sides of the nose, which helps reduce any air leakage out the top. The mask itself is fairly thin and I suggest letting it air dry after use as it doesn't look like it would hold up to repeated trips thru the clothes dryer.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Dislike it is nothing like the photo, just a thin piece of material

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
First off the Quality seems great with the exception that the top and bottom are not hemmed. This may not be an option for this stretchy material and maybe it's not even a problem for this material, but it is a point of concern that only time will tell.

It looks great and is comfortable. The shipping even during these times was reasonable at a week and a day. I believe it was less than a week via USPS. The price seems to high but not outrageous under the circumstance and for the ability to have a stile of your choice.

As for the pandemic and as a functional mask:

This mask is not great for protection, but that's not even the point of masks. I can put on a surgical mask, cover it with this mask and then remove the surgical mask loops from my ears. Then this becomes more comfortable, better looking, and more protection than a surgical mask alone.

So it has it's uses. First if masks become mandatory anywhere this will conveniently meet the mandate and I will keep distant and wash my hands for safety as always.

Second, It's a great mask for aesthetics while DJing (from home) during the pandemic and possibly even after, and that is 75% of why I bought it, to have fun under the circumstances.

I recommend these to everyone as a convenient option although they seem overpriced right now. If you need a mask for safety because personal distancing is not an option at your job this type of mask will be worse than no mask at all. Get or make something better. As a final thought, this could be somewhat helpful for mild allergies for people like myself who get irritated during times of peak pollen especially at my wooded home, but again, if someone has severe allergies this would be a waste of effort.

So it is what it is which means it's a good product for the right people for the right use cases and a bad option for someone needing personal safety from a mask.
titles: It is what it is.  5 stars for the right people but 4 stars during Covid-19.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: If you're searching for something to wear over your mouth and nose while in public places like grocery stores, this might be it. The bandanas and home made masks I tried kept riding up or down and needing adjustment, ie, touching my face. This is just tight enough to stay in place while walking around.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: This is just cheap fabric sewn into a tube. It doesn't even have a hem on the cut edges to protect it from tearing or running. 5 minutes after putting it on I noticed runs in the fabric. So now I get to hem it myself to get some use out of it before it falls apart, yay.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: I must have misread (or misunderstood) the measurements and that is on me, but it is very narrow and tighter on your throat or face than I was expecting. That feature could be great for some purposes, but I was looking for just a little looser scarf to go around my neck. I still really like it, I just will use it in a different capacity. Still a five star rating as the colors are so vibrant and the quality seems very good.
titles: Good quality, very cute but very narrow

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
Don't waste your money on this product. Not even close to the quality nor type of material portrayed in the pics and video on the product page.

This is about $0.80 of a spandex type fabric. The ends were not hemmed and look like not even much care was taken in cutting them. They are sure to fray and unravel quickly.

Maybe good for use as a wrist band or head band, but not functional as a face/mouth cover for dust, etc
as it refuses to stay in place.

Oh - and if you want to return this rip-off item, they will deduct another $3+ in return shipping fees.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: This product is a made of a thin layer of woven fabric and is quite tight around the face. The thin layer makes this poor as any sort of face mask on its own but works well when placed over a surgical/dental type face mask. It‚Äôs so snug that it does hold open sides of a surgical mask tightly to cheeks, improving the seal of the actual mask. I assume this would improve the viability of the surgical mask but I have no hard evidence.
titles: As a mask, needs another primary filter

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
It's a fancy pattern, it's lightweight, it will work well for my wife. But I have a large head and I can not talk in wearing this without getting a mouthful of material. The picture kind of shows it, but probably doesn't do it justice.

Also, if I breath through my nose, it still causes my glasses to fog up. But this can't really be faulted for that. The seamless portion of it is quite nice. You really do have to look for the seam. However, if they can create a seam that fine, why couldn't they take the time to hem the ends of the tube. Over time, these will fray. Hopefully they last longer than the pandemic lasts.

All in all, they will serve for the purpose they are intended. But they don't fit me very well. So this is overpriced for what it is, you are definitely paying for the fancy pattern (which really does look awesome).
titles: One size doesn't really fit all.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
This item is a rather stylish piece of fabric, sewn into a tube.
- As others have mentioned, it is a simple tube of thin, stretchy polyester fabric.

While it will likely keep certain particles out, I would not suggest this item as an alternative to a safety mask.

It offers some style, but the fabric may be too thin to provide significant protection, depending on the situation.
- I say this because my beard pokes through the fabric.

And on that note, the item presses against my beard (not long), and in turn, the hair presses back against my face.
- overall very uncomfortable.

Bottom line - basic cover, but do not recommend if you have a beard.
titles: simple face cover; questionable effectiveness as barrier against virus

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: At first when I received it I wasn‚Äôt sure it was going to be helpful during the pandemic. But surprisingly it is easy to wear, easy to wash and the most important part it stays put over your nose. I didn‚Äôt want to keep fiddling with a mask around my ears and this is perfect. Pull it down and wear it around your neck till you need it again. Could prob wear as a head band but for now it‚Äôs perfect. I hand wash mine to keep its shape but if you put it in the washer use a laundry bag for delicates so you done stretch it out. And then air dry.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: What a joke. It's nothing more than a piece of material cut off a bolt of material. It is not even hemmed on either end. I'll use it as a face mask just because I happen to have it. But I'll have to hem both ends first.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: I bought a few different bandanas recently given the whole covid-19 situation and this is by far one of my favorites. Not only is the pattern really awesome, the material is really soft and high quality. I take 2 coffee filters ( one within the other ) and place them over my nose and mouth... I then use this bandana to secure the coffee filters in place over my nose and the bandana is long enough that it covers my neck as well. This has been working really well so far. I wash the bandana on the delicates cycle and then line dry it. Again, this is a really great bandana... many people at my local Trader Joe's have asked me where I got it in fact :-)
titles: This is a really great bandana

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
The design that is printed on this is nice. The size overall is okay but there is absolutely no stretch to this. It was bought for a birthday gift for a 9 year old. He can barely get it over his head and even then can‚Äôt use it like it‚Äôs supposed to be used. I can‚Äôt imagine an adult fitting in this.
It‚Äôs not very practical. A t shirt has more stretch. The closest thing I can think of is a button up shirt. Almost that material, with zero stretch.
titles: Does not work because it doesn‚Äôt stretch.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: My Mom wears a permanent neck brace. It can wear on her skin and it's unattractive. I bought a few of these and they are perfect. They are long enough to wrap about the entire brace to protect her skin, wick moisture and have her looking stylish for going out.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
I've bought masks from them for a couple of years (Burning Man), because I enjoyed the designs and they were good for a quick dust cover. But this is the most expensive I've ever seen them, (previously bought for $8 incl shipping before. Now it's double that at time of this posting).
Just going to say this: The quality of the product is okay for $7-9, $~16 is not worth it. The masks are like wide long headbands, no elastic just a long tube of thin folded stretchy cloth. Nicely stylish but very tight over the nose area, kind of hangs loose over the chin area. Hurts if you have to wear it for longer than ~30 mins (I have an average small adult female face). Might be a great fit on kids. I'll be making my own, and will support a different company in the future.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
The product design I purchased was the OG Haze. The way I use it is as a hair sock to retain moisture in my hair when I've used leave in conditioner and gone to sleep. For this use it definitely useful and does it's job perfectly. The material color is not as vibrant as the pictures show on Amazon, however the details are noticable. Lastly, I can't really speak on the longevity of this item as I've only had it for a short while. But I can say it looks that it will last for a reasonable amount of time when used with care as it looks well made. (Note: I have not attempted to wash it yet.)
Overall, I recommend it for anyone looking to use this in the same manner as I have.
titles: Great when used as a hair sock

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Probvably great if you are a 9 year old who wants to rob a bank. Terrible if you have a normal adult sized head and neck. Better off cutting off a child's one piece swimsuit. That's about what this is like.
titles: Flimsy small tube of swimsuit material...

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: This is a single layer polyester tubular fabric worth about $.25. Talk about taking advantage of a crisis. Edges are now finished and ragged. The picture shows a tapered design, but this is straight tubular. The mask slips down off your head and you constantly have to pull it back up. It is not contoured around the nose so there are gaps. Basically a piece of expensive crap.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: LOVE it! Can't wait to buy the other ones I want! Definitely going to the range in style!

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
This is the worst product I have ever purchased on Amazon! They literally just cut the top and bottom of this product and left it unfinished to fray and fall apart. And also it‚Äôs so tight that if you open your mouth to speak the material goes in your mouth !
Do yourself a favor and stay away from this.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Pretty bad, like no good, it has a tone of slack, it's like wearing a sock over my face, definitely cheap production. Also won't work as a baclava, is breathable band will keep the neck area warm however, as I tried it on for the first five uses, all within the first 20 mins of use I have gotten loos strands coming undone from the entry loop (bottom of face print)
titles: Works for looks but not a filter...

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Don‚Äôt waste your money. You can accomplish the same thing by getting a length of material and sewing the ends together leaving two sides open. Absurd waste of money.
titles: VERY thin, just a tube of unfinished fabric

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
This is nothing more than a piece of fabric cut from a sleeve. What a rip-off üò°
Zero stars is not option but Amazon needs that option!

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: I like this material. I wear it for a virus face mask. I pull it down over my big head, and wear it around my neck, pull it up when going public. It is a little snug on me, would be fine for a smaller neck. On a hot day, I wet it with cold water before pulling it on, keeps me cool. The camo print looks good, very stylish I think, I prefer it to a white paper mask. I got one for my wife, she likes it too. I would by this again.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Very disappointed. It's very thin material (can see right thru it) and the top and bottom edges are not finished (there should be a finish seam for top and bottom) they are just raw cut. Maybe it would be ok if it was $2-3 but not at the price they are charging. Just another ripoff.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: This is a thin, super stretchy material. This is a mask I ordered during the pandemic, because I knew it would come more quickly than a standard medical style (albeit cloth) mask. I keep this one in my car. It scrunches down small, so it doesn't take up much room. It washes well. It highlights my eyes - yes, I picked the green color specifically for that purpose. I mean, if you're going to have to wear a mask, why not? I'm going to wear this for running during the cool months, so it's going to get plenty of use.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: A bit thinner than I expected but any thicker would be uncomfortable really. delivery was extremely fast. 3 days sooner than quoted! very comfortable to wear.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: This looks like the pictures. Good color, just was hoping to be a little thicker to protect from the winter winds

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: The material looks like it is unfinished. It is stretchy, but the ends are not sown. It is on the thinner side and my beard was piercing through the material. Similar to what other reviewers have said, it appears as if a pair of leggings was cut from both ends and shipped out. I thought this would be a good eco-friendly replacement for the disposable face masks, but sadly it didn't meet my needs. Also to note, after wearing this throughout the day, my face has been numb for the past hour or so. It's sad I ordered this in 2 prints and now they're practically useless. I will be opting for a better cloth face mask.
titles: Looks like a quick hack job

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Super thin, a little thicker than a nylon stocking! One sided, colors on the outside are good. Not a good value at $17 ea adding tax and shipping Which is 30% of listed price of $12. In my opinion a RiP OFF. By doubling it over you might be able to use a neck covering, why?

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: CHEAPLY made !!!! Crap, don‚Äôt buy it. It‚Äôs a piece of material, edges are not stitched. Top offüò°

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
Fabric is as described except they simply cut the tube of fabric (no finishing or edging or even pinking) and then folded and packed it.
Easy to breathe through an even see-through, so don't count on this as a very effective dusk mask.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
The concept was cool. Might be ok for a child. It runs pretty small - about the size of a small to medium thigh?
It is not stretchy enough to counter that and it would be difficult to stay up if it were. I guess I'll take it apart and use it to make a regular mask - it's pretty but otherwise kind of useless. Wish I'd read the reviews - I almost always read the reviews!

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Super thin piece of crap.....picture looks so much different than the piece of crap that came...its the thinnest cotton material sewed into a tube....one thin layer which isnt protecting you from any thing...im mad that i wasted almost $18 including the shipn all together

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: I feel scammed with this purchase. Cheap flimsy fabric - just a tube not even stitched - just cut of at a certain length in an assembly line. I am trying to return or get my money back and haven't even been able to do that with this product. BEWARE: there are unscrupulous sellers THIS IS ONE.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: This is a piece of crap. Since this shut down Amazon is allowing people to be ripped off with substandard products. This looks like someone sowed two pieces of cloth together to form a tube and put it in plastic package. Looks very unfinished.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Can‚Äôt believe I paid $12.95 for this. Basically take an old long sleeve polyester T shirt and cut about 7 inches from the top of the sleeve and voila! You have your mask!! The edges are raw cut fabric too. Of course these do not protect you from virus which can penetrate this fabric but they will protect others from your droplets when you cough or speak.
titles: Make your own from a T shirt

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
This was not as thick as it looks. It‚Äôs extremely thin. The best part about this the design. Other than that it‚Äôs a very flimsy piece of fabric
It‚Äôs also very tight. My hat size is 7-3/8 and this does not fit on my loose like in the pics.

If your looking for something very thin that likely won‚Äôt do anything but provide a thin layer this is it.
titles: Not as premium as it looks

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:

The material is thick enough to give you the coverage that you need but not to thick to be out in the heat with them on.
The multiple designs you can order make it easy to switch up your designs each time you order.

I highly recommend these fore people that work or recreation in area's that need that full face coverage for protection.

.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports

Very thin material

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
I'm using this for covering my face during the Covid-19 epidemic. I'm an essential worker that works for a grocery retail in the meat/seafood dept.
I have very sensitive skin and the face masks hurt my ears and I can barely breathe out of them, let alone it dogs my glasses up all the damn time.
This face mask works very nicely!
I can breathe out of it and worry not about itchy skin, nor foggy glasses. I work 8-10 hr shifts everyday, and this didn't harm nor heat me up much at all!
This gets 5 from me, after working about 2/3 days with it on. It also helps during the cold bursts we had during April, hitting windy 30-40 degree weather.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: I purchased this to use as my hiking face shield for those dusty trails. I think the material is perfect for that. Its not to thick but at the same time provides enough protection. The print is super adorable and its versatile. You can use this as a bandana as well to collect some of that head sweat while hiking. Overall, I would highly recommend this product.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
Very nice cooling (cooler) facemask. I purchased this as my COVID19 facewear because wearing a mask similar to a surgical mask just made me too hot with the heat from my breath.

Once you take one end and fold it inside to the top (because it runs fairly long full length) you get a facemask you can use to be safe but not one that is uncomfortable or "too hot"
titles: A great facemask that won't trap in too much heat for a cooler feel

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Bought this for my husband for a multi use thing. He love it for helping to keep grinder dust and other gross stuff out of his face while working. product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports

review_contents:

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
I recently picked up the "galaxy" seamless headband for $9.95 from IntoTheAM. it is in the photo laid on top of the others. at the same time i also picked up a 9-pack from SoJourner for $14.99, so around $1.66 each. they are the other ones you see in the photo -- at least the other ones i didn't give to my daughter.

The IntoTheAM has more stars on it, while the others focus on the colors of the gas nebulas. Both orders arrived at my place on the same day, and as far as I can tell are exactly the same quality and same material.

If you want more colors and variety I highly recommend the 9-pack by SoJourner. Also -- bonus -- if one falls apart you've got eight more. (None of mine have fallen apart.) Or you can give them to friends!

However, if you want a few more stars, and are willing to pay over 5-times the price for a single bandanna of the same quality, definitely get the IntoTheAM version.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: I'm pretty disappointed in this item. It looks great, is a nice texture, I would really love to wear it. But it came with a warning sticker stating that it contains chemicals known to cause cancer, so I now feel like I have to research the matter before I wear the bandana for any amount of time. I've attempted to ask the question publicly, but the post seems to have disappeared. I'll be asking the seller directly next, but in the meantime, I felt the need to voice these concerns, as I'm sure others would appreciate knowing about this issue before making their purchase.
titles: I'm pretty disappointed in this item

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
I know we‚Äôre in a pandemic, but some of y‚Äôall reviewers on this need to chill out a little...
1) I use this mainly for running, and it‚Äôs awesome. Thin and breathable, and I tell myself that I‚Äôm training in the Colorado mountains with my Bane (Batman character) mask on. Plus, I feel like I‚Äôm doing my duty by protecting myself and other walkers/runners on my path, as it keeps my mouth droplets from going into the atmosphere.

2) It BLOODY says ‚Äòseamless‚Äô in the description, people! To me, it‚Äôs not that cumbersome, I just fold it up a little, and then *bam* it stays on pretty well.

3) Their customer service is 10/10 and outstanding. USPS lost the mask I ordered, and EmazingLights/iHeartRaves/INTO THE AM refunded my money so I could reorder the mask. It wasn‚Äôt the company‚Äôs fault at all - they did their part and shipped it on time. Excellent, excellent customer service. So I‚Äôm sure that at the end of the day, if you‚Äôre truly not satisfied, they‚Äôll work with you to fix the issue. But hey, I encourage you to give their product a try.

They got dope designs, too.
titles: It‚Äôs good enough - y‚Äôall 1-star reviewers need to chill

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents:
This has horrible quality written all over it. It's not even finished on the ends. It's so thin you can see through it. The only thing I can think this it would be useful it for is maybe a hair band. And a really expensive hair band if that's the case.
I hate to give a bad review but honestly this is like a dollars worth of cheap material with no elastic on the ends sewn into a tube.

The company should be ashamed to promote something like this seemingly like a mask when people are looking for Masks.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Purchased this because the traditional face masks for the coronovirus were not available and the home made masks weren't working for us. Stretches around face and head for a perfect fit with no gap around nose. You could place a coffee filter inside fabric over your nose and mouth for better protection. If you have a disinfecting spray, you could disinfect by spraying and drying. Not perfect, but better than nothing.

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: Nice face cloth mask. It‚Äôs a tube shape, the fabric is lightweight. I bought the black rose print. It‚Äôs a versatile piece which I like. I wanted more of a fashion statement mask instead of the boring hospital mask. I‚Äôm not the type of wearing mask but since it‚Äôs recommended during this pandemic, I thought why not get a fun print.
titles: Nice black rose print cloth mask

product_name: INTO THE AM Seamless Face Cover Mouth Mask Bandanas for Dust, Outdoors, Festivals, Sports
review_contents: This is very disappointing. It looks like the material was just cut off a bolt folded and stuck in a bag for delivery. I expected something a little better than what I received.
